incident.title: Alt Transit Service disruption Expect 60 minute delays on all trains Recommend alternate transit Bart will honor tickets and provide mutual aid
incident.summary: Effect: Significant Delays | Cause: Other Cause | Start: 02/28/26 10:01 PM | End: 03/01/26 12:59 AM

updates.message:
Alt Transit: Service disruption: Expect 60+ minute delays on all
 trains. Recommend alternate transit. Bart will honor Caltrain tickets and
 provide mutual aid. | Effect: Significant Delays | Cause: Other Cause
